content: the plump zig zag cowl by melissa nelson for starlight knitting society materials 1 skein plump by spincycle yarns shown in andromeda and neveruary or 100 yards chunky weight yarn 16 circular needle size 10 or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker gauge 14 stitches over 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking finished size 20-22 around approximately 7 1/2 tall after blocking instructions cast on 77 stitches place marker join in the round row 1 & 2 knit all stitches row 3 & 4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round row 5 *k2 k2tog yo k3 repeat from * to end of round row 6 knit all stitches row 7 *k1 k2tog yo k4 repeat from * to end of round row 8 knit all stitches row 9 *k3 yo skp k2 repeat from * to end of round row 10 knit all stitches row 11 *k4 yo skp k1 repeat from * to end of round row 12 knit all stitches repeat row 5-12 twice more then work row 5-7 once then work row 3 & 4 once knit 2 row bind off loosely www starlightknittingsociety com copyright 2023
